00058 /*****************************************************************************\
00059  * NOTICE OF CONVENTION                                                      *
00060  * ------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
00061  * Mspec links to Pcode, Hcode, and Lcode modules.  In order to allow this   *
00062  * to take place without requiring front-end modules to link to liblcode.a,  *
00063  * Mspec code is divided into two classes as follows:                        *
00064  *  - mi_*.c must not depend on linkage to liblcode.a                        *
00065  *  - ml_*.c may depend on linkage to liblcode.a                             *
00066 \*****************************************************************************/
00067 
00068 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00069 #include <config.h>
00070 #include <stdio.h>
00071 #ifdef M_HPPA_FOR_HCODE
00072 #include <Hcode/h_ccode.h>
00073 #endif
00074 #include <Lcode/l_main.h>
00075 #include "m_hppa.h"
00076 
00077 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00078 #define M_HPPA_SIZE_VOID        0
00079 #define M_HPPA_SIZE_BIT         1
00080 #define M_HPPA_SIZE_CHAR        8
00081 #define M_HPPA_SIZE_SHORT       16
00082 #define M_HPPA_SIZE_INT         32
00083 #define M_HPPA_SIZE_LONG        32
00084 #define M_HPPA_SIZE_FLOAT       32
00085 #define M_HPPA_SIZE_DOUBLE      64
00086 #define M_HPPA_SIZE_POINTER     32
00087 #define M_HPPA_SIZE_UNION       -1
00088 #define M_HPPA_SIZE_STRUCT      -1
00089 #define M_HPPA_SIZE_BLOCK       -1
00090 #define M_HPPA_SIZE_MAX         64
00091 
00092 #define M_HPPA_ALIGN_VOID       -1
00093 #define M_HPPA_ALIGN_BIT        1
00094 #define M_HPPA_ALIGN_CHAR       8
00095 #define M_HPPA_ALIGN_SHORT      16
00096 #define M_HPPA_ALIGN_INT        32
00097 #define M_HPPA_ALIGN_LONG       32
00098 #define M_HPPA_ALIGN_FLOAT      32
00099 #define M_HPPA_ALIGN_DOUBLE     64
00100 #define M_HPPA_ALIGN_POINTER    32
00101 #define M_HPPA_ALIGN_UNION      -1      /* depends on the field */
00102 #define M_HPPA_ALIGN_STRUCT     -1
00103 #define M_HPPA_ALIGN_BLOCK      -1
00104 #define M_HPPA_ALIGN_MAX        64
00105 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00106 int
00107 M_hppa_type_size (int mtype)
00108 {
00109   switch (mtype)
00110     {
00111     case M_TYPE_VOID:
00112       return M_HPPA_SIZE_VOID;
00113     case M_TYPE_BIT_LONG:
00114       return M_HPPA_SIZE_BIT;
00115     case M_TYPE_BIT_SHORT:
00116       return M_HPPA_SIZE_BIT;
00117     case M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR:
00118       return M_HPPA_SIZE_BIT;
00119     case M_TYPE_CHAR:
00120       return M_HPPA_SIZE_CHAR;
00121     case M_TYPE_SHORT:
00122       return M_HPPA_SIZE_SHORT;
00123     case M_TYPE_INT:
00124       return M_HPPA_SIZE_INT;
00125     case M_TYPE_LONG:
00126       return M_HPPA_SIZE_LONG;
00127     case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
00128       return M_HPPA_SIZE_FLOAT;
00129     case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
00130       return M_HPPA_SIZE_DOUBLE;
00131     case M_TYPE_POINTER:
00132       return M_HPPA_SIZE_POINTER;
00133     case M_TYPE_UNION:
00134       return M_HPPA_SIZE_UNION;
00135     case M_TYPE_STRUCT:
00136       return M_HPPA_SIZE_STRUCT;
00137     case M_TYPE_BLOCK:
00138       return M_HPPA_SIZE_BLOCK;
00139     default:
00140       return -1;
00141     }
00142 }
00143 
00144 int
00145 M_hppa_type_align (int mtype)
00146 {
00147   switch (mtype)
00148     {
00149     case M_TYPE_VOID:
00150       return M_HPPA_ALIGN_VOID;
00151     case M_TYPE_BIT_LONG:
00152       return M_HPPA_ALIGN_BIT;
00153     case M_TYPE_BIT_SHORT:
00154       return M_HPPA_ALIGN_BIT;
00155     case M_TYPE_BIT_CHAR:
00156       return M_HPPA_ALIGN_BIT;
00157     case M_TYPE_CHAR:
00158       return M_HPPA_ALIGN_CHAR;
00159     case M_TYPE_SHORT:
00160       return M_HPPA_ALIGN_SHORT;
00161     case M_TYPE_INT:
00162       return M_HPPA_ALIGN_INT;
00163     case M_TYPE_LONG:
00164       return M_HPPA_ALIGN_LONG;
00165     case M_TYPE_FLOAT:
00166       return M_HPPA_ALIGN_FLOAT;
00167     case M_TYPE_DOUBLE:
00168       return M_HPPA_ALIGN_DOUBLE;
00169     case M_TYPE_POINTER:
00170       return M_HPPA_ALIGN_POINTER;
00171     case M_TYPE_UNION:
00172       return M_HPPA_ALIGN_UNION;
00173     case M_TYPE_STRUCT:
00174       return M_HPPA_ALIGN_STRUCT;
00175     case M_TYPE_BLOCK:
00176       return M_HPPA_ALIGN_BLOCK;
00177     default:
00178       return -1;
00179     }
00180 }
00181 
00182 /*
00183  *      The following functions are for documentation only.
00184  *      The function overhead is too great for actual usage.
00185  */
00186 void
00187 M_hppa_char (M_Type type, int unsign)
00188 {
00189   type->type = M_TYPE_CHAR;
00190   type->unsign = unsign;
00191   type->align = M_HPPA_ALIGN_CHAR;
00192   type->size = M_HPPA_SIZE_CHAR;
00193   type->nbits = M_HPPA_SIZE_CHAR;
00194 }
00195 
00196 void
00197 M_hppa_short (M_Type type, int unsign)
00198 {
00199   type->type = M_TYPE_SHORT;
00200   type->unsign = unsign;
00201   type->align = M_HPPA_ALIGN_SHORT;
00202   type->size = M_HPPA_SIZE_SHORT;
00203   type->nbits = M_HPPA_SIZE_SHORT;
00204 }
00205 
00206 void
00207 M_hppa_int (M_Type type, int unsign)
00208 {
00209   type->type = M_TYPE_INT;
00210   type->unsign = unsign;
00211   type->align = M_HPPA_ALIGN_INT;
00212   type->size = M_HPPA_SIZE_INT;
00213   type->nbits = M_HPPA_SIZE_INT;
00214 }
00215 
00216 void
00217 M_hppa_long (M_Type type, int unsign)
00218 {
00219   type->type = M_TYPE_LONG;
00220   type->unsign = unsign;
00221   type->align = M_HPPA_ALIGN_LONG;
00222   type->size = M_HPPA_SIZE_LONG;
00223   type->nbits = M_HPPA_SIZE_LONG;
00224 }
00225 
00226 int
00227 M_hppa_layout_order (void)
00228 {
00229   return M_BIG_ENDIAN;
00230 }
00231 
00232 void
00233 M_set_model_hppa (char *model_name)
00234 {
00235   if (!strcasecmp (model_name, "PA_1.0") ||
00236       !strcasecmp (model_name, "PA-1.0"))
00237     M_model = M_HP_PA_1_0;
00238   else if (!strcasecmp (model_name, "PA_1.1") ||
00239            !strcasecmp (model_name, "PA-1.1"))
00240     M_model = M_HP_PA_1_1;
00241   else if (!strcasecmp (model_name, "PA_7100") ||
00242            !strcasecmp (model_name, "PA-7100"))
00243     M_model = M_HP_PA_7100;
00244   else if (!strcasecmp (model_name, "PA_X") ||
00245            !strcasecmp (model_name, "PA-X"))
00246     M_model = M_HP_PA_X;
00247   else if (!strcasecmp (model_name, "PLAYDOH_LCODE") ||
00248            !strcasecmp (model_name, "PLAYDOH-LCODE"))
00249     M_model = M_HP_PLAYDOH_LCODE;
00250   else if (!strcasecmp (model_name, "PLAYDOH_MCODE") ||
00251            !strcasecmp (model_name, "PLAYDOH-MCODE"))
00252     M_model = M_HP_PLAYDOH_MCODE;
00253   else
00254     M_assert (0, "M_set_model_hppa:  Illegal model specified!");
00255 }
